meanings.definition: The quality of being stylish or attractive.
meanings.sent1: Her spiffiness caught everyone's attention at the party.
meanings.sent2: The spiffiness of his outfit made him stand out in the crowd.
meanings.sent3: She added a touch of spiffiness to her look with a colorful scarf.
meanings.sent4: The spiffiness of the new car was undeniable, turning heads wherever it went.
meanings.sent5: The spiffiness of the room decor made it a cozy and inviting space.

meanings.definition: The act of making something neat or tidy.
meanings.sent1: His spiffiness in organizing his desk impressed his colleagues.
meanings.sent2: She took pride in the spiffiness of her room, always keeping it clean.
meanings.sent3: The spiffiness of his folding skills made laundry day a breeze.
meanings.sent4: She achieved a new level of spiffiness in her closet organization.
meanings.sent5: The spiffiness of the freshly cleaned car made it sparkle in the sunlight.
